about.title: Certificates
about.subtitle: Additional studies
about.history: During my university studies, I realized how vast the world of development is. With technologies constantly evolving and new tools emerging, I saw the need to learn them as soon as possible to adapt and advance in my projects. So, I began taking additional courses, some out of curiosity and others to prepare myself for projects I wanted to be part of. These certificates reflect the evolution of my learning.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.labelMessage: Example: Hi Axl, would you like to join our team?
